com.diffplug.common.testing

Class FakeTicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.base.Ticker
      • com.diffplug.common.testing.FakeTicker

  • @Beta
 @GwtCompatible
public class FakeTicker
extends Ticker

    A Ticker whose value can be advanced programmatically in test.

    The ticker can be configured so that the time is incremented whenever read() is called: see setAutoIncrementStep(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit).

    This class is thread-safe.

    Since:
    10.0

      • advance

        public FakeTicker advance(long nanoseconds)

      • setAutoIncrementStep

        public FakeTicker setAutoIncrementStep(long autoIncrementStep,
                                       TimeUnit timeUnit)

        Sets the increment applied to the ticker whenever it is queried.

        The default behavior is to auto increment by zero. i.e: The ticker is left unchanged when queried.

      • read

        public long read()
